segments.text: Did you happen to bring that book that we were talking about yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did . Let me go get it for you . Here you go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like the way that the gifts I get increasingly more lavish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had no idea that there were specific things that should be given on different anniversaries .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what does it say you should give your wife this first anniversary ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It says that traditionally , give something made of paper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can think of two things made of paper â€” stationery and money .
segments.speaker: S2
